attributes.action: To pardon all UK soldiers after a war or conflict ends to stop prosecution
attributes.additional_details:
The answer..there has never been a major prosecution of any IRA in this country.The rate of killing between UK soldiers being killed and IRA members killed is shocking. UK soldiers was 90%-10%, which means the IRA killed 90% more. It's about time this country unites and ends this once and for all for our soldiers.
Please sign and share if you are a soldier, connected to one or a civilian who just cares about how hard your soldiers work to keep you safe. 
OUR SOLDIERS SHOULD NOT BE PROSECUTED!!!
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition for all UK soldiers to be pardoned after the end of a war or conflict. 
At present the UK plan to try and prosecute over 200 UK veterans, some of these date back to as much as 47 years ago!
Ask yourself, how many IRA soldiers were prosecuted by the British Government..
